T02D1537:112a-1: shr'i tsa kra samba ra ho mo pa yi ka /
T02D1537:112a-3: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
T02D1537:112a-4: / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la
T02D1537:112a-5: phyag 'tshal lo // sngo ser dmar po margat ljang gu'i sku 'chang spyan gsum can //
T02D1537:112a-6: dbang chen la sogs phyogs bzhi'i zhal mnga' shes rab dmar spyan gsum //
T02D1537:112a-7: phyag gnyis bgegs kyi lpags 'dzin rdo rje dril bu gnyis na 'chang //
T02D1537:112a-8: phyag gzhan phyag mtshan brgyad po 'dzin pa bde ba'i mchog gis srungs //
T02D1537:112a-9: thog mar bde mchog 'khor lo yi //
T02D1537:112a-10: rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las ni //
T02D1537:112a-11: sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D1537:112a-12: sbyin sreg rim ba bdag gis bshad //
T02D1537:112a-13: dkyil 'khor dag ni sgrub dus su //
T02D1537:112a-14: sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par bya //
T02D1537:112a-15: gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la //
T02D1537:112a-17: las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1537:112a-18: sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02D1537:112a-19: sbyin sreg las rnams med pa las //
T02D1537:112a-21: de bas 'dir ni sngags pa yis //
T02D1537:112a-22: brtson pas sbyin sreg las rnams bya //
T02D1537:112a-23: bla med nang dang phyi yi ste //
T02D1537:112a-24: sbyin sreg dag ni gsum du 'dod //
T02D1537:112a-25: gzhan dag zhi ba la sogs pa //
T02D1537:112a-26: sbyin sreg dag ni bzhi ru 'dod //
T02D1537:112a-27: de la bla na med pa dang /
T02D1537:112a-29: rnam rtog med pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02D1537:112a-30: thab khung dgra yi mtshan ma dag / rnam dben me yi dbus su ni //
T02D1537:112a-31: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga //
T02D1537:112a-32: sems las byung ba ma lus pa'i //
T02D1537:112a-33: yam shing dag gi sreg blugs bya //
T02D1537:112a-34: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'byung ba rnams//
T02D1537:112a-35: yam shing du ni rab grags yin //
T02D1537:112a-36: padma thab khung yin par bshad //
T02D1537:112a-37: rdo rje blugs gzar yin par grags //
T02D1537:112a-38: rtag tu sa bon sreg blugs kyis //
T02D1537:112a-39: bla med gnas ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1537:112a-40: bla med rjes su sbyor ba yis //
T02D1537:112a-41: phung po la sogs bud shing bsreg / ye shes mi ni skye 'gyur bas //
T02D1537:112b-0: @112b phyi rol bsregs pa bdag med yin //
T02D1537:112b-1: dzny'a na p'a da pas bshad pa //
T02D1537:112b-2: sbyin sreg cho ga'i phyi rim pa //
T02D1537:112b-3: sems dang sems byung ngag yin te //
T02D1537:112b-4: phung po la sogs bud shing bsreg / ye shes 'bar ba bla med 'dod //
T02D1537:112b-5: sems kyis ci tsam bsam pa dag / phyi rol sbyin sreg yin par 'dod /
T02D1537:112b-6: ye shes me la phung po yi //
T02D1537:112b-7: yam shing bsreg pa bla med yin //
T02D1537:112b-8: de nas yang nang gi brjod par bya ste /
T02D1537:112b-9: nyon mongs ser ba zhi byed cing //
T02D1537:112b-10: ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir //
T02D1537:112b-11: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas bdag / ji lta bar ni sems kyis bya //
T02D1537:112b-12: skye ba'i las las rnam grol zhing //
T02D1537:112b-13: tshe ni yang dag 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02D1537:112b-14: ci 'dod sreg blugs las bya ba //
T02D1537:112b-15: nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu bshad //
T02D1537:112b-16: ji ltar dus bzhi'i rim pa yis //
T02D1537:112b-17: sbyin sreg bzhi yang rab tu bshad //
T02D1537:112b-18: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02D1537:112b-19: dbang dang mngon spyod shes par bya //
T02D1537:112b-20: sdig pa 'jig phyir zhi ba ste //
T02D1537:112b-21: bsod nams yongs 'dzin rgyas pa yin //
T02D1537:112b-22: chags pa bsgom phyir dbang 'gyur te //
T02D1537:112b-23: rtog pa zad phyir gsod pa yin //
T02D1537:112b-24: de nas yang phyi'i bshad par bya ste /
T02D1537:112b-25: rgyud so so la slob dpon tha dad pas sbyin
T02D1537:112b-26: sreg gi cho ga ji bzhin bshad pa las 'di
T02D1537:112b-27: ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la brten te /
T02D1537:112b-28: bdag gis 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag cung zad tsam brjod par bya'o //
T02D1537:112b-30: sems can dbye bas mtha' yas te //
T02D1537:112b-31: rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru 'gyur //
T02D1537:112b-32: las kyi dbye bas bzhi ru 'gyur //
T02D1537:112b-33: thab khung rnams ni de ltar bshad //
T02D1537:112b-34: zhi ba la ni zlum la dkar //
T02D1537:112b-35: rgyas la dbang chen ser po ste //
T02D1537:112b-36: dbang la dmar po gru gsum pa //
T02D1537:112b-37: mngon spyod zla ba phyed pa yin //
T02D1537:112b-38: khru gang tshad las brtsams nas ni //
T02D1537:112b-39: khru ni bcu drug pa yi bar //
T02D1537:112b-40: de yi phyed du brkos nas ni //
T02D1537:112b-41: rang gi tshad du bya ba yin //
T02D1537:112b-42: khru gang tsam gyi thab khung la sor bzhi bor bar kha khyer sor bzhis bstod /
T02D1537:112b-43: khru phyed brkos la de bzhin du thams cad la'ang
T02D1537:112b-44: bltas te kun kyang rang gi kha khyer du bya'o
T02D1537:112b-45: // thab khung gi nang du rdo rje dang zangs gri bri'o //
T02D1537:112b-46: phyogs bzhir kha tv'am ga dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams bri /
T02D1537:112b-47: kha khyer la padma'i steng du zangs gri'i phreng ba /
T02D1537:113a-0: thab kyi phyi rol du zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi @113a * //
T02D1537:113a-1: ba dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab ste /
T02D1537:113a-2: 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1537:113a-3: sgo bzhi dang ldan pa dur khrod brgyad dang bcas
T02D1537:113a-4: pa ji ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1537:113a-5: phyag mtshan bzhin du 'dir yang de ltar blta'o //
T02D1537:113a-6: shar gyi sgo la sogs par lcags kyu la sogs pas mtshan par bya'o //
T02D1537:113a-7: phyi'i dkyil 'khor la padma nags kyi lcug ma dang /
T02D1537:113a-8: phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs dang //
T02D1537:113a-9: ri dags pags pa mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1537:113a-10: zla ba phyed pa rgyal mtshan dang //
T02D1537:113a-11: ral pa'i tshogs dang mig dang ni //
T02D1537:113a-12: 'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang //
T02D1537:113a-13: ral gri phub dang mdung dang ni //
T02D1537:113a-14: dril bu ba dan rma bya dang //
T02D1537:113a-15: ra skyes lnga lnga byas nas ni //
T02D1537:113a-16: shar phyogs snam bu dag la bri //
T02D1537:113a-17: de ltar thab khung thams cad byas nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha khyer bya'o //
T02D1537:113a-18: zhi ba la rdo rjes mtshan pa'am 'khor los mtshan pa'o //
T02D1537:113a-19: rgyas pa la ni rin po ches mtshan pa /
T02D1537:113a-20: dbang la ni padmas mtshan pa /
T02D1537:113a-21: drag po la ni rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ste /
T02D1537:113a-22: 'di ltar las dang rjes su mthun par rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa'i kha khyer bya'o //
T02D1537:113a-23: shar du zhi ba bya bar bshad //
T02D1537:113a-24: lho phyogs su ni rgyas pa ste //
T02D1537:113a-25: dbang gi las ni nub tu bya //
T02D1537:113a-26: bsad pa byang du bya ba yin //
T02D1537:113a-27: ji ltar las dang rjes mthun pa'i //
T02D1537:113a-28: rdul tshon gyis ni rdzogs par bri //
T02D1537:113a-29: yang na me tog dag kyang rung //
T02D1537:113a-30: thab khung dag ni de ltar bya //
T02D1537:113a-31: yam shing bud shing rdzas la sogs //
T02D1537:113a-32: mtshan nyid me yi rtags rnams ni //
T02D1537:113a-33: gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas na //
T02D1537:113a-34: 'dir ni bdag gis ma bsgrags so //
T02D1537:113a-35: man ngag gcig pu'i rim pa dag / rnal 'byor rgyud las grags pa rnams //
T02D1537:113a-36: mdor bsdus nas ni nges par yang //
T02D1537:113a-37: ji tsam nus pa bshad par bya //
T02D1537:113a-38: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis lus khrus byas te dri zhim pos bdugs la /
T02D1537:113a-41: thal ba bsres pas lus byugs te ji skad bshad pa'i rgyan bgo bar bya'o //
T02D1537:113a-42: stag gi pags pa bgos shing phyag rgya lngas brgyan te /
T02D1537:113a-43: na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pas sems can gyi don rtag tu bya'o //
T02D1537:113a-44: phyi rol zlog tshul 'chad pa ni //
T02D1537:113a-45: de ni zhi sogs las rnams la //
T02D1537:113a-46: thugs ni zhi bar shes par bya //
T02D1537:113b-0: nyi mas gdungs pa'i @113b rgya mtsho che //
T02D1537:113b-1: gangs ltar nang grang phyi rol tsha //
T02D1537:113b-2: thugs rje chen po khro bo yi //
T02D1537:113b-4: de lta bu'i las dang rjes su mthun par gos kyi bye brag bgo bar bya'o //
T02D1537:113b-5: de ni sgrub pa po'i las so //
T02D1537:113b-6: de nas rang gi lha'i nga rgyal bskyed de //
T02D1537:113b-7: ji skad bshad pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D1537:113b-8: gzugs su byas la zhal bzhi pa dang sku gsung
T02D1537:113b-10: de bzhin gsal byed raksha raksha dang //
T02D1537:113b-11: h'um gsum phat ni brjod par bya //
T02D1537:113b-12: gsang sngags de las khro bo la sogs pa spros te /
T02D1537:113b-13: bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bsregs par byas nas thal ba dang /
T02D1537:113b-14: bgegs rnams bsregs te phyogs bcur byer bar bsam mo //
T02D1537:113b-15: de bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs kyang bya'o //
T02D1537:113b-16: de ltar bgegs kyi tshogs rnams phur bu dang /
T02D1537:113b-18: ra ba la sogs pas thab khung gi than kor bgegs med par byas te /
T02D1537:113b-19: thab khung byin gyis brlab par shes par bya ste /
T02D1537:113b-20: yi ge h'um ngam rang gi lha'i tshogs kyi yi
T02D1537:113b-21: ge gang yang rung ba las dang rjes su mthun
T02D1537:113b-22: pa las thab khung bskyed la /
T02D1537:113b-23: de'i dbus kyi lta ba la yi ge re pha
T02D1537:113b-24: 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa las gru gsum par
T02D1537:113b-26: de'i grva gsum la aom a'a: h'um yi ge gsum
T02D1537:113b-27: gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams
T02D1537:113b-30: mtho ris kyi gzugs padma dang /
T02D1537:113b-32: rdo rje gsum la sa bon bskyed de /
T02D1537:113b-33: dbus su re pha 'bar ba yongs su gyur ba mthong ba dang /
T02D1537:113b-34: mtshan ma'i yi ge gsum dang re pha yongs su
T02D1537:113b-35: gyur pa las 'bar ba'i dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1537:113b-36: gnas pa la / khams gsum gyi bdag po dpal
T02D1537:113b-37: khrag 'thung rnam par spros te zhi ba'i don du
T02D1537:113b-38: p'a pa ka'i me bsgoms la zhi ba'i gzugs can
T02D1537:113b-39: dkar po zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum
T02D1537:113b-40: pa ral ba'i cod pan can phyag g-yas pa gnyis
T02D1537:113b-41: na dbyug to dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin
T02D1537:113b-42: gnas pa la / pa / g-yon pa na bgrang phreng dang /
T02D1537:113b-44: rgyan dang gos dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D1537:113b-46: lus thams cad la bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun 'bab pa /
T02D1537:114a-2: de bzhin du rgyas pa la khyad par yang mdog
T02D1537:114a-3: ser po gos ser po'i rgyan can dbang chen gyi
T02D1537:114a-5: ye shes kyi mes sems can thams cad la mchog stsol ba /
T02D1537:114a-9: l'a ma cod pan du bsgom mo //
T02D1537:114a-10: rim pa gzhan yang dbang dang dgug pa la 'dod
T02D1537:114a-11: pa'i me mdog dmar po me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1537:114a-12: pa / de gos dmar pos brgyan pa /
T02D1537:114a-13: khanda ro ha cod pan la gnas pa /
T02D1537:114a-14: khyad par du g-yas g-yon gnyis la lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1537:114a-15: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1537:114a-16: bsad pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa mdog nag po 'jigs pa spyan zlum po //
T02D1537:114a-17: h'um gi sa bon las skyes pa gos dang rgyan nag po mi rus kyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1537:114a-18: za byed 'bar ba lta bus 'bar ba'i dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1537:114a-19: gzugs can ma'i cod pan can /
T02D1537:114a-20: g-yas na ral gri 'dzin pa 'jigs byed chen po
T02D1537:114a-21: nag po 'bar ba las bya rgod dang khva la
T02D1537:114a-22: sogs pas nam mkha' khyab par bkug ste /
T02D1537:114a-23: gang dang gang bya ba de zos par bsgom mo //
T02D1537:114a-24: rlung gi mes ni bsad pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-26: de la zhi ba la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me 'am /
T02D1537:114a-28: bram ze 'am tha mal pa'i mes bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-29: rgyas pa la ni rgyal po dang /
T02D1537:114a-32: rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-33: dbang la ni smad 'tshong ma dang /
T02D1537:114a-34: rje'u rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-35: dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang /
T02D1537:114a-37: lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-38: gsod pa la ni rdo las byung ba'i me'am /
T02D1537:114a-39: gdol pa'i khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-40: thams cad kyang dur khrod kyi me dang /
T02D1537:114a-41: dur khrod kyi sol bar ldan par bya'o //
T02D1537:114a-43: de nas mchod yon snod gnyis ni //
T02D1537:114a-44: ma chag sdug cing mdzes pa dang //
T02D1537:114a-45: chang ngam yang na sbyar ba'i chang //
T02D1537:114a-46: me tog ldan pas dgang bar bya //
T02D1537:114a-47: de la bdud rtsi lnga po yis //
T02D1537:114a-48: gnyi gar yang ni blugs par bya //
T02D1537:114a-49: yi ge bdun pa gcig pu dang //
T02D1537:114b-0: gnyis pa gnod mdzes rgyal po dag / gcig ni brgya @114b rtsa brgyad pa ste //
T02D1537:114b-1: gnyis pa dag ni bzhi cha yin //
T02D1537:114b-2: gnas la legs par bzhag nas su //
T02D1537:114b-3: gos kyis bkab ste mchod par bya //
T02D1537:114b-4: mchod yon gyi snod kyi cho ga'o //
T02D1537:114b-5: sbyin sreg yo byad thams cad kun //
T02D1537:114b-6: bdag gi g-yas su dgod par bya //
T02D1537:114b-7: rdo rje de bzhin dril bu dang //
T02D1537:114b-8: mchod yon snod ni g-yon du gzhag / dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar dang //
T02D1537:114b-9: mar ni mdun du gzhag par bya //
T02D1537:114b-10: thams cad kyang ni bsangs nas gzhag /'di ni rdzas kyi gzhag pa'o //
T02D1537:114b-11: de nas phyi rol gyi me blangs la gnod mdzes
T02D1537:114b-12: kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyis ku sha blangs la
T02D1537:114b-13: de'i chus lan gsum bsangs la //
T02D1537:114b-14: rtsa skam po gtsang ma dang bcas pas dag par byas te /
T02D1537:114b-15: bdud rtsi lnga bsres nas thab khung du bzhag ste /
T02D1537:114b-16: aom te ru ka ma h'a badzra dzva la dzva la h'um h'um /
T02D1537:114b-17: gsang sngags 'di dang bcas pas rlung yab kyis g-yab ste thab tu me sbar ro //
T02D1537:114b-18: de'i dbus su dam tshig sems dpa'i me sngar bshad pa'i rnam par bsams te /
T02D1537:114b-19: ye shes sems dpa'i me sngags dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya 'dis spyan drangs te /
T02D1537:114b-20: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la /
T02D1537:114b-21: mthe bong srin lag gi tshigs la bkug pa'i thabs kyis spyan drang ngo //
T02D1537:114b-22: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de bi ra shi dvi dza satta ma gri h'i tva /
T02D1537:114b-23: aa h'u ti ma h'a r'a smin san nani hi to bha ba /
T02D1537:114b-24: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra p'a ba ka
T02D1537:114b-25: / aagna ye ma ma sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1537:114b-27: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra ma he ndra aagna ye ma ma pushtim ku ru boo shta /
T02D1537:114b-29: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra k'a ma aagna
T02D1537:114b-30: ye ma ma aa mu kam ba sham ku ru
T02D1537:114b-32: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra kro dha aagna ye dza hi kro dha'a ya h'um /
T02D1537:114b-33: aa mu ka m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D1537:114b-35: me lha 'ongs pa dang 'thor mthud dang nye rig
T02D1537:114b-36: bya ste bkug la dam tshig gi me la gzhug
T02D1537:114b-37: go // de nas mchod yon gyi snod blangs la /
T02D1537:114b-38: bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te thugs ka nas zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02D1537:114b-39: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra pra w'a ra satk'a ram pra t'atstshi sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:114b-40: de nas lag pa gnyis kyis lan gsum aargha 'di dbul te /
T02D1537:114b-41: ai ma h'a ma ma ya tatata ma grihna mame pra ya tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:114b-43: de nas 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1537:115a-3: de nas yang lag drag tu dgos par bya'o //
T02D1537:115a-4: de nas rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas yid kyis dbang bskur te /
T02D1537:115a-5: l'a sye la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1537:115a-6: dar dbyangs dang phreng ba la sogs pas bcings te go bskon no //
T02D1537:115a-7: de nas me long dang sman la sogs pa khrus kyi yo byad dang /
T02D1537:115a-8: dril bu dkrol zhing spos dang rdzas snga ma dang
T02D1537:115a-9: bcas pa la yi ge brgya pa bzlas te khrus
T02D1537:115a-10: bya'o // yi ge brgya pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1537:115a-11: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya zhes bya'o //
T02D1537:115a-12: de nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gsang sngags dang /
T02D1537:115a-13: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi gsang sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1537:115a-14: zhi ba la ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs can rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1537:115a-15: rgyas pa la ni l'a ma'i tshul can rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1537:115a-16: dbang la ni dum skyes ma'i tshul can snang nga mtha' yas dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1537:115a-17: bsad pa la ni gzugs can ma'i tshul can don yod grub pa dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02D1537:115a-18: me lha'i zhal dang dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi
T02D1537:115a-19: kha la rang gi bdag po'i sa bon gyi yi
T02D1537:115a-20: ge dgod do // de nas aom d'a ki n'i dzi na dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:115a-21: 'dis mar la mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1537:115a-22: de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang l'a ma dang
T02D1537:115a-23: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gdab
T02D1537:115a-24: bo // de ltar me 'bar bar shes nas thog mar blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum /
T02D1537:115a-25: aom he ru ka dzva la dzva la h'um /
T02D1537:115a-26: sngags 'di dang bcas pas dbul lo //
T02D1537:115a-27: de nas me 'bar ba dang mdog dang sgra la
T02D1537:115a-28: sogs pa las bgegs med par shes nas bgegs thams
T02D1537:115a-29: cad bcing bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bzhi nas ku
T02D1537:115a-30: sha dgram mo // aom mi me ku sha shu bha dimba pu ta brahma b'a bi hri na /
T02D1537:115a-31: ratna tra ya ra ha hrid pri thv'i dz'a ta garbha /
T02D1537:115a-32: aa bi ghn'am ma ma sh'antim ku rbantu sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:115a-33: 'di lta bu'i rim pas rtsa ba dang bcas pa phyung ste /
T02D1537:115a-34: mdog ljang gu mtshan nyid dang ldan pa /
T02D1537:115a-35: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sbyar ro //
T02D1537:115a-36: gzhan rnams la ni mnyam por gcad par bya'o //
T02D1537:115a-37: me'i rim pa ni shar gyi mdun nas te /
T02D1537:115a-38: lho ni lho yi mdun nas so //
T02D1537:115a-39: nub ni nub kyi mdun nas te //
T02D1537:115b-0: byang ni byang gi mdun @115b nas so //
T02D1537:115b-1: me thab kyi phyogs su zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod la bsngags te bsang ngo //
T02D1537:115b-2: de nas zhal bzhi pa'i sngags sam /
T02D1537:115b-3: khanda ro he'i gsang sngags yang rung bas mda' dang
T02D1537:115b-4: tshon skud la btab ste mda' bzhi phyogs mtshams su
T02D1537:115b-5: btsugs la / tshon sna lnga'i skud pas yongs su
T02D1537:115b-6: bskor na rdo rje'i bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro
T02D1537:115b-7: btsugs la / // ku sha la sogs dgram pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1537:115b-8: de nas me'i las dang rjes su mthun par dngul gyi snod dam /
T02D1537:115b-9: padma'i snod gang yang rung ba mdun du bsams te yang mchod yon gyi zhabs bsil dang /
T02D1537:115b-11: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1537:115b-12: pus mo gnyis kyi nang du lag pa bzhag ste /
T02D1537:115b-13: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis dgang
T02D1537:115b-14: gzar blangs la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung brtan par
T02D1537:115b-15: bzung ste / sor mo lhag ma rnams yu pa'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D1537:115b-16: mar gyis yongs su bkang ba'i dgang blugs bdun nam
T02D1537:115b-17: gsum mam gcig me lha'i sngags kyis me lha'i zhal
T02D1537:115b-18: du dbul lo // aom he ru ka aagna ye /
T02D1537:115b-19: aa mu ka s+ya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:115b-20: de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1537:115b-21: de nas bsreg pa'i rim pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D1537:115b-23: de nas yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D1537:115b-25: de nas til dang 'bras chan dang zho ni phyag tu'o //
T02D1537:115b-27: du'r ba'i myu gu ni spyi gtsug la'o //
T02D1537:115b-31: mon sran gre'u rnams ni zhal la'o //
T02D1537:115b-32: de bzhin du zhu ba'i rdzas la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02D1537:115b-37: mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag la'o //
T02D1537:115b-38: mar me ni mdun du ste /
T02D1537:115b-39: de dag ni rim pa yin no //
T02D1537:115b-40: de nas sdig pa bsreg pa'i phyir //
T02D1537:115b-41: dang po til gyi sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1537:115b-42: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:115b-43: de nas rdzas thams cad gsang sngags gcig gis bya'o //
T02D1537:115b-44: aom badzra aa gna la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva
T02D1537:115b-45: l'a ya sarba p'a pam bha smim ku ru dsarba
T02D1537:115b-46: bighn'am h'um phat / aa mu ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:115b-47: yang na aom he ru k'a ya bid ma he bidy'a r'a dza ya dhi ma he sv'a h'a'o //
T02D1537:116a-0: b'i ra pra dzo rda ya @116a * //
T02D1537:116a-1: ya h'um aa mu ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-2: yang na rgyud gzhan las bshad pa //
T02D1537:116a-3: so so'i spyi'i sngags kyang rung ngo //
T02D1537:116a-4: aom badzra ya dzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-8: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya 'di zhes bya ba p'a pa da ha sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-9: til dang yungs kar rnams kyi'o //
T02D1537:116a-10: aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-12: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1537:116a-14: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-16: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-18: aom badzra ghasma re sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-20: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-22: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-24: aom badzra pu shta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-26: aom ma h'a shr'i ba ya ba ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116a-27: star ka dang gla gor zho sha dang /
T02D1537:116a-28: dz'a ti pha la la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1537:116a-29: zhu ba'i rdzas lhag ma rnams ni me'i rang gi sngags rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1537:116a-30: au dumw'a ra'i shing gi yal ga la sogs pa lhag ma rnams la ni //
T02D1537:116a-31: aom la sogs pa nas rang rang gi ming dang /
T02D1537:116a-32: mthar sv'a h'a dang bcas pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1537:116a-33: rdzas thams cad la bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1537:116a-35: bsangs gtor la sogs pa bya ste //
T02D1537:116a-36: ye shes kyi me spyan drangs la /
T02D1537:116a-37: snying gnas yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul nam mkha' las bkug ste /
T02D1537:116a-38: lam ma lus pa'i bzhi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1537:116a-39: ye shes kyi me ji skad bshad pa'i las kyi
T02D1537:116a-41: ji skad bshad pa'i mdog dang /
T02D1537:116a-42: phyag ji lta bar gnas pa'i dpal khrag 'thung gi gzugs mthong ba dang /
T02D1537:116a-43: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams dang /
T02D1537:116a-44: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
T02D1537:116a-46: aom shr'i badzra he ru ka ae hye hi bha ga b'a na /
T02D1537:116a-47: ai ha bha ktya sa ma ye na tsa panytsa
T02D1537:116a-48: aa mri ta aargham sam pra t'i tstsha sva p'a
T02D1537:116a-49: dz'a tsa ha nam pra siddhi mme /
T02D1537:116a-50: 'dis thab khung g-yas kyi drung du bltas te /
T02D1537:116a-51: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1537:116a-52: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
T02D1537:116b-0: l'a sye la sogs @116b pas yang dag par mchod do //
T02D1537:116b-1: rtsa ba'i sngags rkang pa brgyad kyis bstod do //
T02D1537:116b-2: rdo rjes bcings la lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D1537:116b-4: dril bu rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02D1537:116b-8: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: / sa ma ya stvam /
T02D1537:116b-10: 'dis me'i dam tshig sems dpa'i zhal du thams cad kyi bdag nyid rab tu gzhug go //
T02D1537:116b-11: de ltar snga ma bzhin du me long gi steng du khrus byas la dbang lnga stsol te /
T02D1537:116b-12: dar dpyang dang phreng ba bcings te /
T02D1537:116b-13: ye shes sems dpa' rang gi thugs kar mtshan ma'i
T02D1537:116b-14: dbus su rang gi chos kyi yi ge la dkyil
T02D1537:116b-15: 'khor ma lus pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i
T02D1537:116b-16: rang bzhin mthong ba la yang mchod yon phul te
T02D1537:116b-17: snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams
T02D1537:116b-18: cad bsangs te de nas dgang gzar blangs la /
T02D1537:116b-19: ji tsam blugs nus pa'i dgang blugs me lha'i zhal du dbul lo //
T02D1537:116b-20: de bzhin du blugs gzar gyis stong ngam brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02D1537:116b-22: bzhi cha yang rung bsreg go //
T02D1537:116b-23: de nas yang dgang blugs gsum dbul te 'di ltar
T02D1537:116b-24: dkyil 'khor ma lus pa kun la bcu pa'i sbyin
T02D1537:116b-25: sreg bya'o // thams cad la dgang blugs dang /
T02D1537:116b-28: yi ge brgya pa gsum mam gcig bzlas te me tog la sogs pa dag dbul lo //
T02D1537:116b-29: sbyin sreg gi yo byad lhag ma thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1537:116b-30: dbyangs skyong gi gsang sngags sam /
T02D1537:116b-32: rdo rje phag mo'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags
T02D1537:116b-33: gang yang rung ba 'di zhes bya ba sh'antim ku
T02D1537:116b-34: ru sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba mthar gdags so //
T02D1537:116b-35: rgyas pa'i mthar ni pushtim ku ru boo shat //
T02D1537:116b-38: yang dri zhim po las byung ba ci yang rung ste /
T02D1537:116b-39: thams cad bdag gi kha zas la sogs pa 'byor ba'i don du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1537:116b-40: de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas la
T02D1537:116b-41: dngos grub kyi phyir rgyud las bshad pa'i rdzas rnams
T02D1537:116b-43: ba lang sha dang rta sha dang /
T02D1537:116b-44: shva na'i sha dang khyim bya dag / dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
T02D1537:116b-45: sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig / mi ldog phreng ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D1537:117a-2: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gnyis kyis //
T02D1537:117a-3: dgug pa la sogs bya ba yin //
T02D1537:117a-4: de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mthar //
T02D1537:117a-5: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1537:117a-6: nye ba'i snying po 'di gsum mam bdun nam nyi
T02D1537:117a-7: shu rtsa gcig mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sngar la
T02D1537:117a-8: // mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang 'thor 'thung dang
T02D1537:117a-9: dril bu rol mo snga ma bzhin du dbul lo
T02D1537:117a-10: // // dgang blugs kyi mthar bde legs dang /
T02D1537:117a-11: rol mo dang bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcas pa 'bul lo //
T02D1537:117a-12: de nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1537:117a-13: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol la bzod par
T02D1537:117a-14: gsol te rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya bcings la
T02D1537:117a-15: / aom he ru ka mu: 'dis steng du 'grol te /
T02D1537:117a-16: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1537:117a-17: ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T02D1537:117a-18: de nas aom kha kha kh'a hi zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis nya dang /
T02D1537:117a-21: zan drin la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1537:117a-22: me'i dbus nas ye shes sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su gyur te gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1537:117a-23: de nas me lha la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te //
T02D1537:117a-24: sbyin sreg gi yo byad kyi lhag ma rnams kyang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1537:117a-25: sreg blugs kyi mthar bsgrub bya bzung la dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02D1537:117a-26: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang bsang gtor yang bya /
T02D1537:117a-27: sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang gsol te /
T02D1537:117a-28: aom aagna ye y'a hi y'a hi sv'a rtha nytsa w'a pa r'a rtha nytsa /
T02D1537:117a-29: s'a dhi tam gatstsha ha bya bhu ka ces bya'o //
T02D1537:117a-30: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong phyir bskyed
T02D1537:117a-31: pa'i tshul gyis sprul ba'i me 'bar ba'i gzugs can
T02D1537:117a-32: du blta ba de gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1537:117a-33: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1537:117a-34: rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa yang lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1537:117a-35: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02D1537:117a-36: zhes bya bas phyogs kyi phur bu dang mda' rnams phyung la /
T02D1537:117a-37: las thams cad pa'i chu 'o ma dang bcas pa
T02D1537:117a-38: la khanda ro ha'i rig sngags kyis btab ste khrus
T02D1537:117a-40: de nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02D1537:117a-41: glu dang gar la sogs pa bdun bya zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D1537:117b-0: dpal @117b sdom rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las //
T02D1537:117b-1: sbyin sreg rim pa byung ba 'dis //
T02D1537:117b-2: rnal 'byor pa ni rtag dga' ba'i //
T02D1537:117b-3: dngos grub myur du thob par shog / dpal he
T02D1537:117b-4: ru ka'i ming gi rgyud las dpal bde mchog 'khor
T02D1537:117b-5: lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub pa'i slob dpon
T02D1537:117b-6: chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1537:117b-7: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
